synopsis.text:
Yuki's rising stardom as an idol singer and Touya's hectic life as a university student create a complex web of challenges in their blossoming relationship. Touya, juggling two jobs and his studies, finds it increasingly difficult to spend quality time with his beloved girlfriend, Yuki. As her popularity soars, Yuki's managers and rival singers in the cutthroat idol industry make it even harder for the young couple to maintain their bond.

Amidst these trials, the couple receives unexpected support from Rina Ogata, a famous idol and Yuki's close friend. Rina goes to great lengths to create opportunities for Touya and Yuki to be together, even hiring Touya herself. However, her well-intentioned plan backfires when the production company discovers her scheme, resulting in Touya's dismissal. Rina's mysterious behavior and unwavering dedication to the couple leave Touya questioning her true intentions.

As Touya navigates the intricate world of idol singers, college life, and the challenges that come with dating a celebrity, he begins to wonder if their love can truly withstand the mounting pressures. Will Touya and Yuki's relationship survive the tumultuous world of fame, or will it crumble under the weight of their individual dreams and aspirations? Only time will tell in this heartwarming and dramatic tale of love and ambition.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
